tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (NP (NP (NP (ADJP (RB Very) (JJ sad)) (NN segment)) (PP (IN on) (NP (NP (JJ homeless) (NNS families)) (PP (IN on) (NP (CD 60) (NNPS Minutes))) (NP-TMP (NN tonight))))) (. .)))
